conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through baffles to predict which container it will flow into.
Baffle A is green and redirects liquid to the left.
Baffle B is yellow and redirects liquid to the right.
Baffle C is green and redirects liquid to the left.
Baffle D is pink and redirects liquid to the right.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
Liquid from C will flow into container E.
Liquid from D will flow into container F.
Liquid from A and C will flow into container E.
Liquid from B and D will flow into container F.
